description: Expansion of (1+2*x^3+x^4)/((1-x^2)^2*(1-x^4)); Molien series for 3-dimensional representation of group 2x = [ 2+,4+ ] = CC_4 = C4.
references: B. Sturmfels, Algorithms in Invariant Theory, Springer, p. 42.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1,1,-1,-1,1)
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 2 x^3 + x^4) / ((1 - x^2)^2 (1 - x^4)), {x, 0, 60}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 15 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
